abilities.name: Oracle AI
abilities.description: After the speaker reveals an unrevealed public objective, choose 1 unrevealed public objective card and place that card on your faction sheet. You may look at the card on your faction sheet at any time.

abilities.name: Limited Vision
abilities.description: You may not place a stage II objective card on your faction sheet until all stage I objectives have been revealed.

abilities.name: Probability Algorithms
abilities.description: When the speaker would reveal the next public objective, they must reveal the public objective card on your faction sheet instead. Place that card near the other public objectives.

faction_techs.name: Psychographics
faction_techs.description: During the status phase, you may score 1 additional public objective instead of a secret objective.

faction_techs.name: Sentient Datapool
faction_techs.description: At the start of the status phase, you may spend 3 trade goods to research 1 technology.

agents.name: Clodho - Speaker
agents.description: After a player explores a legendary planet or a plane that has a technology specialty, you may exhaust this card to allow that player to gain 2 trade goods.

commanders.name: Lachis - Reader
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Win a combat in a system that contains a legendary planet or a planet that has a technology specialty. This card satisfies a yellow technology prerequisite. When you cast at least 1 vote, cast 1 additional vote for every 2 technologies you own.

heroes.name: Atropha - Weaver
heroes.description: SYNCHRONICITY ALGORITHM - WOVEN FATE. ACTION: Draw 3 objective cards from 1 of the public objective decks; choose up to 1 of those cards to replace an objective card on a player's faction sheet, and return the others to the bottom of their corresponding decks. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Read the Fates
promissory.description: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you may look at the public objective card on the Ilyxum player's faction sheet. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Ilyxum player's units, return this card to the Ilyxum player.

flagship.name: Nemsys
flagship.description: When this unit makes a combat roll, it rolls 1 additional die for each secret objective you have scored.

mech.name: Iledrith
mech.description: DEPLOY: After researching a technology, you may place 1 mech on a legendary planet, or a planet that has a technology specialty, that you control.

starting_fleet.name: Augurs Starting Flet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 2 Destroyers, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Secret Maps
abilities.description: At the end of your tactical actions, you may explore 1 planet in the active system that is or contains 1 or more of your units with PRODUCTION that you did not explore during that tactical action.

abilities.name: Fortune Seekers
abilities.description: Once per action, after you explore a planet or frontier token, you main gain 1 commodity.

abilities.name: Ancient Blueprints
abilities.description: The first time you gain a cultural, hazardous, industrial, or unknown relic fragment, place the corresponding 'Fragment' token on your faction sheet.

faction_techs.name: Broker Network
faction_techs.description: Each planet you control that has a technology specialty or an attachment gains the PRODUCTION 1 ability as if it were a unit.

faction_techs.name: Merged Replicators
faction_techs.description: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, you may exhaust this card to swap 1 of those unit's PRODUCTION with another on the game board, or apply +2 to the total PRODUCTION value of those units.

agents.name: C.O.O Mgur - Deft Tradesperson
agents.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose 1 player. For each Fragment token on your faction sheet, that player gains 1 commodity. For each commodity they would gain in excess of their commodity value, they gain 1 trade good instead.

commanders.name: C.M.O. Ranc - Marketing Guru
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 3 Fragment tokens on your faction sheet. Your commodity value is increased by 1.

heroes.name: C.E.O. Tucc - Visionary Explorer
heroes.description: PRIMORDIAL DATA CORE - GRAND REVEAL. ACTION: Purge this card to explore each planet you control, in any order.

promissory.name: Encryption Key
promissory.description: ACTION: Attach this card to a non-home planet you control. This planet has 1 technology specialty of any color.

flagship.name: Wayfinder
flagship.description: Apply +1 to the results of this ship's combat and ability rolls for each Fragment token on your faction sheet.

mech.name: Auctioneer
mech.description: DEPLOY: When you place a fragment token on your faction sheet, you may place 1 mech on a planet you control.

starting_fleet.name: Bentor Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 2 Cruisers, 3 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: GLory
abilities.description: After you win a combat, you may place or move a Glory token into the active system, or spend 1 token from your strategy pool to research a unit upgrade technology of the same type as 1 of your units that participated in that combat.

abilities.name: Heroism
abilities.description: Capture your fighters and infantry that are destroyed during combat. When you pass, for each Glory token on the game board, you may return 4 of your captured units to gain 1 command token.

abilities.name: Valor
abilities.description: When units make a combat roll in a system that contains a Glory token, each result of 10, before applying modifiers, produces 1 additional hit.

faction_techs.name: Zhrgar Stimulants
faction_techs.description: Once per action, after a player produces 1 or more hits during a round of combat in a system that contains a Glory token, gain 1 trade good. After a player rolls combat dice, you may exhaust this card to allow that player to reroll any number of those dice.

faction_techs.name: Star Dragon I
faction_techs.description: This unit may ignore the movement effects of non-supernova anomalies.

faction_techs.name: Star Dragon II
faction_techs.description: This unit may ignore the movement effects of anomalies.

agents.name: Merkismathr Asvand - Marshal of Trade
agents.description: At the start of a combat: Exhaust this card to move a glory token to the active system, if able. Then, the active player may gain a number of commodities equal to the number of neighbors they have.

commanders.name: Sdallari Tvungovot - Marshal Engineer
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 2 Glory tokens on the game board. When researching a unit upgrade technology, each of your unit upgrade technologies may satisfy 1 prerequisite it shares with the technology you are researching.

heroes.name: Ygegnad, The Thunder - Honorary Skald
heroes.description: A TALE OF LEGENDS - FOR ETERNAL GLORY. ACTION: For each system that contains a Glory token, remove up to 1 command token in or adjacent to that system from the game board and gain 1 command token, if able. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Vassalage
promissory.description: Apply +1 to the results of each of your fighters' combat rolls during this combat. The Kjalengard player captures each of your fighters destroyed during this combat. Then, return this card to the Kjalengard player.

flagship.name: Hulgade's Hammer
flagship.description: After the first round of a combat in this system, place up to 2 of your captured units in this system or on that planet.

mech.name: Skald
mech.description: When you pass, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on this planet if there is a Glory token in or adjacent to this system.

starting_techs.name: Berserkers Starting Tech
starting_techs.description: Choose one non-faction unit upgrade technology.

starting_fleet.name: Berserkers Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Destroyer, 4 fighters, 4 infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Projection of Power
abilities.description: At the start of any space combat in a system that is adjacent to or contains 1 or more of your space docks, choose up to 1 ship in that system to gain ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 6 during that combat.

abilities.name: Industrialists
abilities.description: During setup, place 1 additional space dock in your reinforcements.

faction_techs.name: Emergency Mobilization Protocols
faction_techs.description: At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool to remove a command token from a system that contains 1 or more of your space docks.

faction_techs.name: Trade Port I
faction_techs.description: This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to 2 more than the resource or influence value of this planet. Up to 3 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

faction_techs.name: Trade Port II
faction_techs.description: This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to 4 more than the resource or influence value of this planet. Up to 3 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity. This unit may use its ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE during each round of space combat.

agents.name: George Nobin - Esteemed Merchantman
agents.description: At the end of a player's tactical action: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to spend 2 trade goods or 2 commodities to place 1 spacedock from their reinforcements on a planet they control in the active system.

commanders.name: Henry Storcher - Starbase Commander
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 1 space dock on the game board that is not adjacent to your home system. After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your space docks, gain 1 commodity. Your ships may treat systems that contain 1 or more of your space docks as adjacent to each other.

heroes.name: Titus Flavius - Councilman
heroes.description: TRADER MOBILIZATION ACT - MERCHANT REARAMENT. After aplayer activates a system other than Mecatol Rex: You may place 1 space dock on a planet you control in the active system, convert each of your commodities to a trade good, and use the PRODUCTION ability of each of your units in the active system. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Trade Alliance
promissory.description: When you receive this card, if you are not the Celdauri player, you must place it face up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the Celdauri player's commander ability, if it is unlocked. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Celdauri player's units, return this card to the Celdauri player.

flagship.name: Supremacy
flagship.description: You may use the PRODUCTION ability of other player's space docks in this system to produce ships.

mech.name: Minuteman
mech.description: DEPLOY: After another player activates a system, you may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to place 1 mech on a planet in that system that contains 1 of your space docks.

starting_fleet.name: Celdauri Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Destroyer, 4 Fighters, 3 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Teeming
abilities.description: During setup, place 2 additional dreadnoughts and 1 additional mech in your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Moult
abilities.description: After you win a space combat as the defender, you may produce 1 ship in the active system, reducing the cost by 1 for each of your non-fighter ships destroyed during that combat.

abilities.name: Byssus
abilities.description: You may treat your mechs on planets you control as structures for any purpose other than scoring objectives.

faction_techs.name: Brood Pod
faction_techs.description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your structures, you may exhaust this card to produce 1 ship in the active system. For each of your structures in the active system, you may remove that unit from the game board to reduce the cost of the produced ship by 3.

faction_techs.name: Chitin Hulk I
faction_techs.description: When this unit is destroyed, you may place 1 fighter from your reinforcements in this system's space area.

faction_techs.name: Chitin Hulk II
faction_techs.description: This unit cannot be destroyed by 'Direct Hit' action cards. When this unit is destroyed, you may place 1 fighter or 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in this system's space area.

agents.name: Operator Kkavras - Subspace Grapple
agents.description: At the end of a player's turn: Exhaust this card to allow that player to remove 1 of their command tokens from the game board and place that token in an adjacent system that contains 1 or more of their structures and none of their command tokens.

commanders.name: Spc. Phquaiset - Alloyed Carapace
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 4 structures on non-home planets. While you are the defender during ground combat: After your opponent produces 1 or more hits against your units, you may spend 1 commodity or 1 trade good to cancel 1 of those hits.

heroes.name: Thakt Clqua - Polemarch
heroes.description: CONTINGENCY PLAN - BIOMASS EVENT. ACTION: Gather units from your reinforcements up to equal to your starting units. Place these units, in any combination, in the space area of any systems that contain 1 of your structures and no other players' ships, or on planets you control. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Carcinisation
promissory.description: When 1 of your non-fighter ships is destroyed during combat in a system: You may place 2 fighters from your reinforcements in the space area of that system. At the end of that combat, return this card to the Cheiran Hordes player.

flagship.name: Lithodax
flagship.description: When this unit makes a combat or ability roll, it rolls 1 additional die if this system is adjacent to or contains 1 of your structures.

mech.name: Nauplius
mech.description: When this unit is destroyed, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on this planet.

starting_fleet.name: Cheiran Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 1 Carrier, 1 Destroyer, 2 fighters, 2 infantry, 1 Mech, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Capital Fleet
abilities.description: Destroyers count as 1/2 of a ship against oyur fleet pool.

abilities.name: Migrant Explorers
abilities.description: After you explore a frontier token in any system, you may explore a planet you control that is adjacent to that system.

abilities.name: Flotilla
abilities.description: You cannot have more infantry than non-fighter ships in the space area of a system.

faction_techs.name: Impressment Programs
faction_techs.description: When you explore a planet, you may produce 1 ship in that planet's system. ACTION: Exhaust this card and 1 planet you control to explore that planet.

faction_techs.name: Aegis I
faction_techs.description: When another ship in this system would be destroyed during combat, you may have this ship become damaged instead.

faction_techs.name: Aegis II
faction_techs.description: When another ship in this system would be destroyed by a game effect, you may have this ship become damaged instead.

agents.name: Jgin Faru - Chancellor of Immigration
agents.description: When a player commits 1 or more units to a planet during invasion: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to place 1 infantry from their reinforcements on that planet.

commanders.name: Clona Bathru - Founder of Bathru Robotics
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Research a ship unit upgrade technology. This car satisfies a red tehcnology prerequisite. At the start of a space combat in a system that contains 3 or more different types of your non-fighter ships, produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships.

heroes.name: Verrisus Ypru - Former Admiral of the Unrelenting Battlegroup
heroes.description: DEFENSE MATRIX OVERLOAD - VOLATILE EMP BURST. After the 'Roll Dice' step of space combat: You may purhe this card. If you do, all ships in the active system become damaged; during this round of space combat your ships cannot be destroyed.

promissory.name: Combat Drills
promissory.description: When 1 of your ships would be destroyed: Instead of destroying that ship, place this card face up in your play area. Return this card to the Dih-Mohn player at the start of the status phase.

flagship.name: Maximus
flagship.description: After this unit moves into the active system, you may produce up to 2 units that have a combined cost of 4 or less in that system.

mech.name: Repairitor
mech.description: At the start of a combat in this system you may repair 1 unit you control that is participating in that combat.

starting_fleet.name: Dih-Mohn Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Dreadnoughts, 2 Destroyers, 2 Fighters, 2 Infantry, 1 Mech, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Grace
abilities.description: Once per action phase, after you resolve the primary ability of a strategy card, you may resolve the secondary ability of 1 readied or unchosen strategy card with a lower printed initiative number than that strategy card.

abilities.name: Decree
abilities.description: You may prevent ships from moving through anomalies that contain your ground forces.

abilities.name: Radiance
abilities.description: After an agenda is revealed, you may predict aloud the outcome of that agenda. If your prediction is correct, place 1 command token from another player's reinforcements in a Sigil.

faction_techs.name: Unity Algorithm
faction_techs.description: Once per agenda phase, after an agenda is revealed, you may predict aloud an outcome of that agenda. If your prediction is correct, you may score 1 public objective if you fulfill its requirements; each other player who voted for that outcome draws 1 secret objective.

faction_techs.name: Encrypted Trade Hub
faction_techs.description: You may exhaust this card to allow a player to exchange 1 of their relocs or agendas as part of a transaction. You always vote last during the agenda phase. When an outcome you voted for or predicted is resolved, each player who voted for that outcome gains 1 commodity.

agents.name: Allant - Elder Voice
agents.description: After a player passes: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 player; that player may perform up to 1 action. Then, look at the top card of the agenda deck; you may discard that agenda card.

commanders.name: Kadryn - Highest Grace
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 1 or more laws in play. When any game effect would allow you to score a public objective, you may instead draw 1 secret objective.

heroes.name: Midir - Living Will
heroes.description: GOLDEN ORDER - PEACE ETERNAL. ACTION: For each Sigil on the game board, draw 1 agenda. Reveal and resolve each agenda in any order as if you had cast 1 vote for an outcome of your choice. Other players cannot resolve abilities during this action. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Edyn Rider
promissory.description: After an agenda is revealed: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud the outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, place 1 command token from another player's reinforcements in a system that contains your units. Then, return this card to the Edyn player,

flagship.name: Kaliburn
flagship.description: Apply +1 to the results of this unit's combat rolls for each law in play.

mech.name: Rune Bearer
mech.description: This system is a 'Sigil' anomaly. Place a Sigil token beneath this unit as a reminder. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

starting_techs.name: Edyn Starting Tech
starting_techs.description: Choose any 3 technologies that have different colors and no prerequisites.

starting_fleet.name: Edyn Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 2 Destroyers, 4 Fighters, 3 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: Mercenaries
abilities.description: At the start of a space combat, you may remove up to 2 fighters you control in a system adjacent to the active system. Then, choose 1 player participating in that combat; that player places the same number of fighters from their reinforcements in the active system.

abilities.name: Data Leak
abilities.description: When you would gain a relic, you may draw 1 additional card; choose 1 to gain and return the rest to the relic deck. The, shuffle the relic deck.

abilities.name: Shadow Markets
abilities.description: When you explore a planet, you may treat that planet as if it had the same trat as another planet you control.

faction_techs.name: Blackmail Programs
faction_techs.description: When a player would perform a strategic actionm you may exhaust this car dand spend 1 token from your strategy pool to end that player's turn; the strategic action is not resolved and the strategy card is not exhausted.

faction_techs.name: Corsair I
faction_techs.description: This unit may move without being transported. Fighters in excess of your ships' capacity count against your fleet pool.

faction_techs.name: Corsair II
faction_techs.description: This unit may move without being transported. Fighters in excess of your ships' capacity count against your fleet pool.

agents.name: Sal Gavda - Black Market Dealer
agents.description: At the start of a player's turn: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove an attachment from a non-home planet they control and attach it to a non-home planet they control other than Mecatol Rex adjacent to that planet's system.

commanders.name: Quaxdol Junitas - The Unseen Hand
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have the outcome you voted for or predicted on an agenda resolved. After the second agenda is revealed during the agenda phase: You may ready 1 planet you control; explore that planet, if able.

heroes.name: Banua Gowen - Administrator of Minds
heroes.description: SLEEPER CELLS - SHADY ACQUISITIONS. ACTION: Place 2 fighters from your reinforcements in each system that contains 1 or more planets you control and no other player's ships. Then, you may remove 1 attachment from any planet in a system hat contains 1 or more of your ships and attach it to 1 planet in your home system. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Underground Market
promissory.description: When you would gain a relic: You may draw 1 additional card; choose 1 to gain and return the rest to the relic deck. Then, shuffle the relic deck. Then, return this card to the Florzen player.

flagship.name: Man O' War
flagship.description: Other players cannot play action cards during a space combat in this system.

mech.name: Privateer
mech.description: You may spend influence as resources to produce this unit.

abilities.name: Rally to the Cause
abilities.description: Once per action, after you produce 1 or more ships in your home system, you may produce up to 2 ships in a system that contains a cultural, hazardous, or industrial planet and does not contain a legendary planet or other players' units.

abilities.name: Diplomats
abilities.description: Once per action, you may exhaust 1 uncontrolled planet's planet card that is on the game board to spend its resources or influence.

abilities.name: Free People
abilities.description: During setup, for each non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex on the game board, place that planet's planet card face up on the game board.

faction_techs.name: Envoy Network
faction_techs.description: At the start of the agenda phase, you may choose and exhaust 1 cultural, 1 hazardous, and 1 industrial planet. When you cast 1 or more votes, if you exhaust at least 1 cultural, 1 hazardous, and 1 industrial planet to cast votes, you may cast 4 additional votes.

faction_techs.name: Covert Strike Teams
faction_techs.description: At the start of a ground combat, you may roll 1 die for each of up to 2 of your ground forces on that planet. For each result equal to or greater than that unit's combat value, produce 1 hit; your opponent must assign it to 1 of their units on that planet.

agents.name: Cordo Haved - Friendly Diplomat
agents.description: While ready, this card has the text ability of each legendary planet ability card any player controls, even if that card is exhausted. You may allow another player to use this card's ability.

commanders.name: President Cyhn - Crisis Leader
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Each non-legendary planet on the game board is controlled. After you gain control of a non-home planet during a tactical action: if you have 1 or more ships in the active system, you may produce 1 ship in that system.

heroes.name: Count Otto P'may - Inspiring Rhetorician
heroes.description: HEART OF REBELLION - FREEDOM OR DEATH. ACTION: Ready a non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex that you control, remove all units on that planet and attach this card to it. Units cannot be committed to, produced on, or placed on this planet.

promissory.name: Broadcast Teams
promissory.description: When you gain control of a planet during a tactical action: If the active system does not contain another player's ships you may produce up to 2 ships in that system. Then, return this card to the Free Systems player.

flagship.name: Vox
flagship.description: When this unit makes a combat roll, it rolls 1 additional die for each planet in this system of any single trait.

mech.name: Liberator
mech.description: DEPLOY: After you use your RALLY TO THE CAUSE faction ability in any system, you may spend 1 trade good to place 1 mech on a planet you control adjacent to that system.

starting_fleet.name: Free Systems Compact Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Carrier, 2 Cruisers, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock, 1 PDS

abilities.name: The Lady & The Lord
abilities.description: During setup, place 1 additional flagship in your reinforcements and the additional Ghemina Hero next to your faction sheet. This additional flagship has the abilities and attributes listed on the Lord flagship card. You have 2 Heroes.

abilities.name: Rule of Two
abilities.description: During a round of combat in a system that contains exactly 2 of your non-fighter ships, if those ships have the same unit type, apply +2 to the result of each of those unit's combat rolls.

faction_techs.name: War Song Implants
faction_techs.description: After you win a combat, you may ready 1 planet you control.

faction_techs.name: Combat Transport II
faction_techs.description: You may reroll 1 of your unit's combat dice during each round of ground combat on a planet in this system that contains 2 or fewer of your infantry.

agents.name: Skarvald & Torvar - Raid Heralds
agents.description: When the active player produces 1 or more hits during a round of combat: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to produce 1 additional hit.

commanders.name: Jarl Vel & Jarl Jotrun - Raid Leaders
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have 2 flagships on the game board. After you win a combat in a system that contains no planets or on a planet that contains a structure, you may gain 1 trade good.

heroes.name: Korela - The Lady
heroes.description: RAZE ORDER - FEAR AND ASH. ACTION: Purge this card to destroy all units on a non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex that is adjacen to a system that contains 1 of your flagships.

heroes.name: Kantrus - The Lord
heroes.description: DESTINY DRIVE - ALLEGED BIRTHRIGHT. ACTION: Purge this card to choose 1 non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex that does not contain another player's units and is adjacent to a system that contains 1 or more of your flagships; gain control of that planet. Then, ready that planet.

promissory.name: Raid Leaders
promissory.description: After you activate a system: Choose 1 non-fighter ship you control; during this action, that unit gains BOMBARDMENT 5(x2) and a capacity of 2. Return this card to the Ghemina player at the end of this action.

flagship.name: The Lady
flagship.description: When a structure you do not control in this system is destroyed, gain 1 trade good.

flagship.name: The Lord
flagship.description: After a player explores a planet in this system, place 1 infantry from their reinforcements on that planet.

mech.name: Jotun
mech.description: After you win a ground combat on this planet, if this planet contains exactly 1 other mech, explore this planet.

starting_fleet.name: Ghemina Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Destroyer, 3 Fighters, 3 Infantry, 2 Space Docks

abilities.name: Abyssal Embrace
abilities.description: When you create the game board, place the Ghoti Space tile where your home system would normally be placed. The Ghoti Space system is not a home system.

abilities.name: Mobile Command
abilities.description: The system that contains your flagship is your home system. Your flagship is your home system. Your flagship cannot be captured and you cannot score public objectives if your flagship is not on the game board.

abilities.name: Spawning Grounds
abilities.description: During setup, gain and ready the Ghoti planet card and its planet ability card; you cannot lose those cards.

faction_techs.name: Networked Command
faction_techs.description: Up to 3 ships in your home system do not count against your fleet pool. When you cast 1 or more votes, you may exhaust this card to cast an additional number of votes equal to the number of command tokens in your fleet pool.

faction_techs.name: Parallel Production
faction_techs.description: When you produce 1 or more units, you may produce 1 additional unit in each of 2 systems that contain 1 or more of your ships and 1 of your command tokens.

agents.name: Becece - Caretaker of Worlds
agents.description: When a player produces 1 or more units: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to either produce 2 additional units or gain 1 trade good.

commanders.name: Ceie Doleegueaunm - Abyssal Queen
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets. After you activate a system: You may treat systems that contain no planets as adjacent to each other during this tactical action.

heroes.name: Nmenmede - Ghoti All Mother
heroes.description: TRANSCENDENCE - THE GHOTI ARISE. ACTION: For each system that contains 1 or more of your non-fighter ships, you may replace 1 of your non-fighter ships in that system with a ship from your reinforcements that has a cost value of up to 2 greater than the cost value of that ship. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: Ghoti Relay
promissory.description: At the start of yout turn: Place this card in your play area to produce up to 2 ships in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships. At the start of the status phase, return this card to the Ghoti player.

flagship.name: All Mother
flagship.description: While in play, this unit is also treated as a space dock with a PRODUCTION value equal to the number of tokens in your fleet pool.

mech.name: Tioleombp
mech.description: This unit can be blockaded. When producing ships in your home sysem, place up to 1 of those units in this system's space area if it is not blockaded.

abilities.name: Mantle Cracking
abilities.description: ACTION: Place 1 'Core' token on a non-home planet you controlother than Mecatol Rex that does not contain a Core token to gain up to 4 trade goods.

abilities.name: Celestial Reclamation
abilities.description: Planets that contain Core tokens have a base resource value of 2 and influence value of 0. Core tokens cannot be removed from the planet that contains them.

abilities.name: Deep Mining
abilities.description: When you would explore a planet that contains 1 of your mechs or structures, you may instead gain 1 trade good.

faction_techs.name: Lightning Drives
faction_techs.description: During movement, you may increase the move value of each of your non-fighter ships not transporting any fighters or infantry by 1.

faction_techs.name: Orion Platform I
faction_techs.description: When this unit makes a SPACE CANNON roll against another player's units, if it rolls at least 1 result of 9 or 10, explore this planet.

faction_techs.name: Orion Platform II
faction_techs.description: When this unit produces 1 or more hit against another player's units, explore this planet. You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are adjacent to this unit's system.

agents.name: Durran - Ember of the Union
agents.description: When 1 or more of a player's units use PRODUCTION: You may exhaust this card to apply +3 to the total PRODUCTION value of that player's units.

commanders.name: Voldun - Forge Lord
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Control non-fighter ships with a cost of at least 10 in 1 system. When you use the PRODUCTION of 1 or more of your units, you may increase the total PRODUCTION value of those units by 1 for each space dock you control.

heroes.name: Gorthrim - Chief of Expeditions
heroes.description: MAGNUM OPUS - WORLD SHAPERS. ACTION: Reveal cards from any non-frontier exploration decks until you reveal up to 3 attachments, if able; attach those cards to any planets you control of the corresponding planet type, and discard the rest. Then, purge this card.

promissory.name: GLEdge Base
promissory.description: ACTION: Attach this card to a non-home planet you control. This planet's resource value is increased by 2.

flagship.name: Beg Bersha
flagship.description: When this unit makes a combat or ability roll, it rolls 1 additional die for each mech in or adjacent to this system.

mech.name: Exodriller
mech.description: When you exhaust this planet to spend resources, you may also spend 1 of it's influence as a resource.

starting_fleet.name: GLEdge Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 1 Carrier, 1 Destroyer, 3 Fighters, 2 Infantry, 1 Mech, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Facsimile
abilities.description: At the start of a space combat while you are the defender, you may spend influence equal to the cost value of 1 of your opponent's ships in the active system to place 1 unit of that type from your reinforcements in that system.

abilities.name: Illusory Prescence
abilities.description: During the agenda phase, after another player casts votes, you may exhaust up to 2 planets you control; that player casts an additional number of votes equal to 1 more than the combined influence values of those planets.

faction_techs.name: Fractal Plating
faction_techs.description: After a unit you control in a system is destroyed, you may exhaust this card to place 1 unit of that type from your reinforcements in the space area of a system adjacent to that system that contains 1 or more of your ships.

faction_techs.name: Fabrication Grid
faction_techs.description: Each system that contains 1 or more of your ships and no planets gains PRODUCTION 2 as if it were a unit you control.

agents.name: Walik - Dull Green
agents.description: When a player produces 1 or mroe units in a system: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to place 1 of the produced units in the space area of an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships.

commanders.name: Komat - Vibrant Blue
commanders.description: UNLOCK: Have ships in 3 or more system not adjacent to or including your home system. At the start of a space combat while you are not the active player: Choose 1 of your non-fighter ships in the active system to gain SUSTAIN DAMAGE until the end of combat.

heroes.name: Bayan - Deep Magenta
heroes.description: WEAVELINK REPLICATOR - TWO BY TWO. ACTION: Purge this card to choose 1 ship you control in each system; for each of those units, you may place 1 unit of that type from your reinforcements in the space area of that unit's system, if able.

promissory.name: Secrets of the Weave
promissory.description: At the start of a space combat while you are the defender: You may spend influence equal to the cost value of 1 of your opponent's ships in the active system to place 1 unit of that type from your reinforcements in that system. Then, return this card to the Mortheus player.

flagship.name: Particle Sieve
flagship.description: After you activate this system, if it does not contain any planrts, you may place 1 frontier token in this system.

mech.name: Duuban
mech.description: When a player commits 1 or more units to a planet oyu control adjacent to this system, you may swap this unit with 1 of your infantry on that planet.

starting_fleet.name: Glimmer Starting Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 1 Dreadnought, 1 Carrier, 1 Destroyer, 2 Fighters, 3 Infantry, 1 Space Dock
